alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Leon County through 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Ralford Greenway, Macon Community Park, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Miccosukee, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Killearn Estates, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Forest Meadows Park and Midtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
